original_text:
For who among them has stood in the council of the Lord
    to see and to hear his word,
    or who has paid attention to his word and listened?
korean_text: 누가 여호와의 회의에 참여하여 그 말을 알아들었으며 누가 귀를 기울여 그 말을 들었느냐

sentences.original_text: For who among them has stood in the council of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중에 누가 주의 회의에 서 있었는가

sentences.original_text: to see and to hear his word,
or who has paid attention to his word
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 누가 그의 말씀에 주의를 기울였는가
